Description: Ambient dimensionality of the generated data.
Number of branches, components, or substructures.
Value of the $j$-th coordinate of an observation.
Latent angular parameter controlling periodic or spiral structure.
Secondary angular parameter $e.g., spherical or toroidal coordinates$.
Scale parameter controlling slope, curvature, or steepness.
Radius of a circular or spherical structure.
Height or vertical extent of a structure.
Magnitude of local jitter or uniform noise.
Noise term added to introduce variability.
Lower and upper bounds of a uniform sampling range.
Height coordinate in pyramidal or conical structures.
Rate parameter of an exponential distribution.
Auxiliary variables for barycentric or spherical sampling.
Number of rotations or loops in spiral-based structures.
Resolution parameter controlling discretization of a curve or surface.
